discussion.content: Read = 4, Write = 2, Execute = 1. Order of permissions is Owner, Group, Public(everyone else), so the answer is that the OWNER gets all permissions, so 4+2+1=7. The GROUP gets READ and EXECUTE, so 4+1=5. Everybody else gets NADA, so 0. The answer is 750.

750
OWNER GROUP Everyone else
7 = rwx 5 = r-x 0 = ---

✑ The owner of the application should be able to read, write, and execute the application. (7) [ 1 1 1 ]
✑ Members of the group should be able to read and execute the application.(5) [ 1 0 1 ]
✑ Everyone else should not have access to the application. (0) [ 0 0 0 ]

C. chmod 750
